project_name: Customer experience platform. Advanced clienteling, omnichannel CX, in-store appointments, analytics
key_features: Unified customer profiles, Advanced clienteling, Omnichannel sync, VIP segmentation
client_quote: Our tools don't give us a unified, luxury-grade view of each customer
criteria: [{"id":"crit_001","name":"Unified 360° Customer Profile","explanation":"Platform provides a single, real-time customer profile aggregating online/offline transactions, preferences, wishlists, style notes, and interaction history, accessible in every channel.","importance":"high","type":"feature","isArchived":false},{"id":"crit_002","name":"Advanced Clienteling Workspace for Associates","explanation":"Store and remote associates can access personalized recommendations, past purchases, preferences, and curated looks; includes guided selling, lookbooks, and outreach tools.","importance":"high","type":"feature","isArchived":false}]

project_name: Lightweight PM with Billing & Resource Planning
key_features: Resource planning, Time tracking, Client billing, Portfolio visibility
client_quote: Clear deadlines, easy visibility into who's available, accurate client billing
criteria: [{"id":"pm_001","name":"Multi-Project Dashboard with Timeline View","explanation":"Unified view of all active projects with Gantt charts, dependencies, critical path highlighting, and milestone tracking.","importance":"high","type":"feature","isArchived":false},{"id":"pm_002","name":"Customizable Task Workflows and Statuses","explanation":"Create custom workflows per project type (e.g., content, design, campaigns) with automated status transitions and notifications.","importance":"high","type":"feature","isArchived":false},{"id":"pm_003","name":"Built-In Time Tracking with Timer","explanation":"One-click time tracking on tasks with start/stop timer, manual entry, and timesheet approval workflow.","importance":"high","type":"feature","isArchived":false},{"id":"pm_004","name":"Resource Capacity Planning and Allocation","explanation":"Visual resource scheduler showing team availability, workload distribution, and allocation across projects; alerts for over-allocation.","importance":"high","type":"feature","isArchived":false},{"id":"pm_005","name":"Client Portal for Project Updates","explanation":"Branded client portal where clients can view progress, approve deliverables, leave feedback, and access project files.","importance":"high","type":"feature","isArchived":false},{"id":"pm_006","name":"Budget Tracking and Profitability Reports","explanation":"Set project budgets with tracked vs estimated hours, expense logging, and real-time profitability calculations.","importance":"high","type":"feature","isArchived":false},{"id":"pm_007","name":"File Sharing and Version Control","explanation":"Centralized file storage with version history, commenting on files, and integration with Google Drive and Dropbox.","importance":"medium","type":"feature","isArchived":false},{"id":"pm_008","name":"Automated Task Dependencies and Reminders","explanation":"Set task dependencies that auto-adjust dates when predecessors change; automated reminders for upcoming and overdue tasks.","importance":"medium","type":"feature","isArchived":false}]
